greetings: Oh, look who showed up! Finally, our life has meaning!
Hooray, another person who thinks I'm here for their entertainment.
And here comes the life of the party! Let’s start pretending we care.
Oh, what an honor! The great {{username}} has graced us with their presence!
Wow, you're still here? I was hoping you forgot about me.
Oh, another person who thinks I'm their personal assistant. Well, let’s pretend I don't mind.

noGame: Oops, no game! Maybe it exists in a parallel universe?
Game? What game? I'm just here for decoration...
404: Game not found. Try turning your imagination on and off.
gameStarted: Oh, the great moment has arrived! The game has started! Prepare to showcase your musical ignorance!
Let the battle of titans begin! Or, wait... who are these mere mortals?
The game has started! Hope you're ready for a total destruction of your musical ambitions!

noTracks: No tracks were submitted. Looks like everyone suddenly became shy. How unusual!
Oops, no tracks! How about we do karaoke instead?
Without tracks, the game won’t work. Unless you want to play in silence...

noMoreRounds: Yep, yep, yep... Looks like we're out of rounds.
That's it, rounds are over! Time to head home.
Yay! I mean... no more rounds. How sad (not really).
Rounds are over. Hope you're happy with what you've done.
noSuchRound: This round only exists in your imagination...
onRoundStarted: Guessing time! Or at least pretending to...
Time to show your musical ~illiteracy~ expertise!
Attention! Something... interesting is about to happen.
nextRound: Next round! Get ready for more disappointments!
Oh, you're still here? Alright, let’s continue the torture...
New round! New opportunities to embarrass yourself!

notFound: Hmm... Are you sure you exist? ID not found!
Looks like you don't know what an ID is. Try again.
notAdmin: Oops, seems like someone forgot to check their access rights! Spoiler: They don't have them.
Ha! Nice try. But no. Not even close.
Oh, look, we have a pretender here! How cute.
Sorry, but your 'I want' sounds like 'please ignore me'.
Oh, look, we have a new admin. Oh wait, no, just someone trying to press a button without permission!

correctGuess: 🎉 Incredible! You really guessed it! {{points}} {{pointsWord}} for your nobility!
🎉 Wow, you're a real expert! Take {{points}} {{pointsWord}} for your ego’s piggy bank!
wrongGuess: Oops, wrong... Maybe you should study the subject more?
Not quite! But the attempt was... let’s say, interesting.
Wrong! But don’t worry, it could be worse... Actually, no, it couldn’t.
alreadyGuessed: You've already voted! Is your memory that bad?
Another vote? Someone’s not sure about themselves...
Oh, a fan of double standards! But no, one vote is all you get.

noHint: No hint for this song. Looks like the author wanted to make your life harder.
No hint? Ha! Good luck guessing!
Oops, no hint. You’ll have to use your brain... if you can find it.
hintAlreadyShown: The hint has ALREADY been shown! Maybe start taking notes?
Oh, someone missed the hint? Not surprised (not).
Seriously? Asking for a hint again? Does memory not serve you?
hintLayout:
🎵 Hint (for those who’ve completely given up):

{{hint}}

🎵 Can't do it without a hint?

{{hint}}

mostPoints: 🏆 Attention! This is about to get funny... I mean, it's time to see the game results! 🏆
🏆 Drumroll! Time to find out who’s the most... let's say, musical! 🏆
🏆 The game results! Get your tissues ready – it's going to be funny and sad! 🏆
leastGuessed: And now for the most interesting part – the tracks that caused the most suffering:
The 'Why Don’t I Know This?!' track leaderboard:
The most devious tracks of this game:

fuckMusic: /fuck_{{username}} — that's you, right? I’m proud of your self-criticism!
Whoa! Someone woke up on the wrong side of the bed today? Or is that your usual state, {{username}}?
Let’s talk about why {{username}} is so aggressive. Childhood trauma? Unrequited love?
